attributes.additional_details:
This coalition government is not not working in the best interest of the country, and is negotiating with each other on power positions of people both parties to force un popular legislation through.  This government has lost its credibility with Europe, The  Lords, NHS, Students, Police , Local Authorities Scotland, Welfare Agencies, Citizens on Family Credit, Disabled, Pensioners , 
I would like a discussion on the dissolve meant of this coalition, it simply isn't working in the best interest of the country. I know people who voted in the last election for the Conservatives and Liberal Democrats are experiencing a cross fertilization of policy and back scratching with jobs for the cabinet ministers resigning in compromising situations and not truly getting the manifesto promises they voted for
